column5: Does anyone know the current price on 24pk of Labatts Blue? Need pricing including deposit on both cans and bottles. We usually purchase our alcohol in Vermilion Bay at the LCBO. There web page is not clear on pricing. Looking for U.S. Funds cost.
$34.95 24 bottle $38.95 24 cans No idea on deposits...this is in Canadian funds.
Figure about $250.00 per man for a week and you'll be "safe".

Bubby: For beer at the LCBO go to the following site:http://www.lcbo.com/stores_products/...rch/index.html Type labatt blue in the product name box and click on display selected products. #11 is for 24 bottles (cost today is 26 USD) while #13 is for 24 cans (cost today is 29 USD). Exchange rate used today 1.3445 Price is exactly the same at any Beer Store - see the following site:http://www.thebeerstore.ca/storesand...dSubmit=Submit
